subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mats Sundin scored with 29.2 seconds left to give Toronto a 3-2 victory over the visiting Washington Capitals on Wednesday night, a day after the Maple Leafs fired John Ferguson as the team’s general manager and replaced him on an interim basis with Cliff Fletcher.
